name: smokers hand
description:
So u loose your lighter all the time and u ask me someone who doesnt smoke for a lighter...sorry i dont have one but i do have this...this hand holds your lighter its hangs around your neck so you notice if its missing...it comes out of the hand if you want to and fits back in the hand snuggly we promise it wont fall out :)

*comes with your first lighter

Please specify in the notes section what color you would like.
www.100luvbombz.com

name: Jetlife hand
description:
inspired by the #Jetsfool
the shaka sign 
the hang loose
the narly sign 
whatever u wanna call it but around here we listen to alot of curren$y and its a plane fool

30 inch chain included

Expedited shipping with tracking number 
Please allow up to one week for creation of your piece since each one is custom made.

name: Custom Pendants
description:
Each one is made to order custom to whatever you want. Sometimes which is bad because its too hard too choose. These are examples of what can be made. They can be really large up to the size of a normal flyer (4x6) or they can be small as u want. This is a fundraiser for the luvbombz so we wont be making these for long! Get yours today... email us @ luvbombz@gmail.com with your order and pay here! 

To view more>
http://www.flickr.com/photos/luvbombz/sets/72157625553745532/

Shipped USPS Priority Mail which is 2-3 business days

*International shipping is available shipping cost different from below

name: Cupid's Demise
description:
So you hate love? We do too! Celebrate that with this shirt dropping a bomb on cupid's stupid head! Our design is printed on american apparel so need to fret about strinking and fadage! 100luvbombz.com first tee get one soon. These are going to be in limited supply!

Available in WHITE or RED
